Welcome to my World! I am a Junior at California State University Long Beach studying Computer Science and I am passionate about building applications that are secure and performant. I have experience in building applications using technologies like flutter, Next.js, and much more. I am looking for Summer 2025 Internships to learn and grow as a developer. Feel free to check out my resume and projects and send me a messege on any of my social media platforms if you have any questions or just want to chat.

My Projects

X Journal App

Utilized Grok AI API using Flutter to create a journaling app that uses AI to analyze your writing and provide insights. Here is the Github link to the project: https://github.com/bryanmax9/XHackathonApp

War Game

Utilized C++ and Vim to create a war game that simulates a game of war between two players. Here is the Github link to the project: https://github.com/SrothCS/Wargame

Space Themed Website

Utilized Next.JS and Tailwind CSS with addition to Framer Motion to portray my interest and my skills in Software Development. Here is the link to the project: https://github.com/SrothCS/Space-Portolio
